description: From bride +‎ -s- +‎ man, by alteration of earlier brideman; compare bridesmaid.

entries.meaning: A male friend or companion of the bridegroom, having various ceremonial duties at a wedding.
examples: It was customary, in those days, for the bride's-man and maiden, and a few select friends, to visit the newly married couple after they had retired to rest […].

entries.meaning: A male bridesmaid; a man who attends a bride during her wedding ceremony, as part of the wedding party.
